name: Add a new ingredient
description:
As a NomNom user,
  I want to add a new ingredient,
  So that I can use it in my recipes.

steps.name: the NomNom application service is running

elements.name: Successfully posting a recipe with title, ingredients, and instruction

steps.name: the user wants to post a recipe with "Toast", "Bread", "Put bread in toaster"
the NomNom application should return the message "Recipe posted!"
the recipe with title "Toast" should exist in the system
the NomNom application service is running

elements.name: Successfully posting a recipe with title, ingredients, instruction, and duration

steps.name: the user wants to post a recipe with "Toast", "Bread", "Put bread in toaster", "5 minutes"
the NomNom application should return the message "Recipe posted!"
the recipe with title "Toast" should exist in the system
the NomNom application service is running

elements.name: Posting a recipe without a title

the NomNom application should return the message "Error! Missing title."
the recipe should not be posted
the NomNom application service is running

elements.name: Posting a recipe without ingredients

steps.name: the user tries to post a recipe with title "Toast" but without ingredients
the NomNom application should return the message "Error! Missing ingredients."
the recipe should not be posted

name: Add new recipe
description:
As a NomNom User, I want to post a recipe to my profile,
  so that all users can view and interact with it.

the user deletes all notifications in their inbox

the user has no notifications in their inbox

name: Delete all notifications
description:
As a NomNom User,
    I want to delete all the notifications in my inbox,
    so that I can keep my inbox clean and organized.

steps.name: the NomNom application service is running
the following recipes exist in the system

elements.name: Successfully deleting a recipe

steps.name: the user wants to delete a recipe with title "Toast"
the NomNom application should return the message "Recipe deleted!"
the recipe with title "Toast" should not exist in the system
the NomNom application service is running
the following recipes exist in the system

elements.name: Attempting to delete another user's recipe

steps.name: the user tries to delete a recipe with title "Lemonade" created by another user
the NomNom application should return the message "Error! You can only delete your own recipes."
the recipe with title "Lemonade" should still exist in the system
the NomNom application service is running
the following recipes exist in the system

elements.name: Deleting a non-existing recipe

steps.name: the user wants to delete a recipe with title "Chips"
the NomNom application should return the message "Error! Recipe not found."
no recipe should be deleted

name: Remove recipe
description:
As a NomNom user, I want to remove a recipe I created,
  so I can keep my collection of recipes clean and relevant.

steps.name: the following userId exist:

elements.name: Successfully delete an existing user

steps.name: a user with ID 1 exists
I send a DELETE request to "/users/1"
the response status should be 200
the user with ID 1 should no longer exist in the system
the following userId exist:

elements.name: Successfully delete an existing user

steps.name: a user with ID 2 exists
I send a DELETE request to "/users/2"
the response status should be 200
the user with ID 2 should no longer exist in the system
the following userId exist:

elements.name: Attempt to delete a non-existing user

steps.name: no user with ID 999 exists
I send a DELETE request to "/users/999"
the response status should be 404
I should see an error message "User with ID '999' not found."
the following userId exist:

elements.name: Attempt to delete a non-existing user

steps.name: no user with ID 500 exists
I send a DELETE request to "/users/500"
the response status should be 404
I should see an error message "User with ID '500' not found."
the following userId exist:

elements.name: Attempt to delete a user with an invalid ID

steps.name: I send a DELETE request to "/users/-1"
the response status should be 400
I should see an error message "Invalid user ID: -1"
the following userId exist:

elements.name: Attempt to delete a user with an invalid ID

steps.name: I send a DELETE request to "/users/0"
the response status should be 400
I should see an error message "Invalid user ID: 0"

name: Delete a user account
description:
As a NomNom user,
  I want to delete my account,
  So that my profile and data are removed from the system.

steps.name: I am logged in as user "<username>"
"<recipeName>" exists as an existing recipe of user "<username>"

elements.name: Successfully add a new ingredient with quantity

steps.name: I add "flour" to the ingredient list of "Recipe 1"
I set "flour"'s quantity to "150g"
I submit modifications
"flour" should appear in the ingredients list of "Recipe 1" and in the database
"150g" should appear next to "flour" in the ingredients list of "Recipe 1" and in the database
I am logged in as user "<username>"
"<recipeName>" exists as an existing recipe of user "<username>"

elements.name: Successfully add a new ingredient with quantity

steps.name: I add "sugar" to the ingredient list of "Recipe 2"
I set "sugar"'s quantity to "200g"
I submit modifications
"sugar" should appear in the ingredients list of "Recipe 2" and in the database
"200g" should appear next to "sugar" in the ingredients list of "Recipe 2" and in the database
I am logged in as user "<username>"
"<recipeName>" exists as an existing recipe of user "<username>"

elements.name: Successfully add a new cooking step

steps.name: I add a cooking step with information "Pour the water into the bowl" to the end of "Recipe 1"
I submit modifications
the new cooking step should appear in the cooking step list of "Recipe 1"
the number of the new cooking step should be "3 + 1"
the step number and step information should appear in the database
I am logged in as user "<username>"
"<recipeName>" exists as an existing recipe of user "<username>"

elements.name: Successfully add a new cooking step

steps.name: I add a cooking step with information "Add sugar and stir well" to the end of "Recipe 2"
I submit modifications
the new cooking step should appear in the cooking step list of "Recipe 2"
the number of the new cooking step should be "2 + 1"
the step number and step information should appear in the database
I am logged in as user "<username>"
"<recipeName>" exists as an existing recipe of user "<username>"

elements.name: Cancel all ongoing modifications

steps.name: I have "flour" as a new ingredient modification
I have "Pour the water into the bowl" as a new cooking step modification
I cancel modifications
cooking step "Pour the water into the bowl" should not appear in the recipe page of "Recipe 1"
ingredient "flour" should not appear in the ingredient list of "Recipe 1"
I am logged in as user "<username>"
"<recipeName>" exists as an existing recipe of user "<username>"

elements.name: Cancel all ongoing modifications

steps.name: I have "sugar" as a new ingredient modification
I have "Add sugar and stir well" as a new cooking step modification
I cancel modifications
cooking step "Add sugar and stir well" should not appear in the recipe page of "Recipe 2"
ingredient "sugar" should not appear in the ingredient list of "Recipe 2"
